test_id: SSC CGL 2020 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 13 Aug 2021 Shift 1__6960f352756b52153608eea1
test_name: SSC CGL 2020 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 13 Aug 2021 Shift 1__6960f352756b52153608eea1

questions.original_question:
<p>How many triangles are there in the given figure ?</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/21/10/F1_Puja_Ravi_21.10.21_D1.png" style="width: 199px; height: 111px;" /></p>

english.explanation: By counting all distinct triangles in the figure (including those formed by overlapping lines) we obtain a total of 13 triangles.

hindi.explanation: चित्र में सभी छोटे‑बड़े त्रिभुज गिनने पर कुल 13 त्रिभुज बनते हैं। प्रत्येक बड़े त्रिकोण के भीतर दो छोटे त्रिकोण तथा उनके संयोजन से बने अतिरिक्त त्रिकोण गिनने से यह संख्या प्राप्त होती है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option in which the words share the same relationship as that shared by the given pair of words.</p>

<p>Horses : Neigh</p>

english.explanation: The relationship is that the second word is the characteristic sound made by the animal in the first word. Ducks make a quack.

hindi.explanation: ‘घोड़ा : हिनहिनाना’ में घोड़ा की ध्वनि (हिनहिनाना) दी गई है। इसी प्रकार ‘बतख : क्वैक (कां‑कां करना)’ में बतख की ध्वनि दी गई है, इसलिए यह जोड़ी समान संबंध दर्शाती है।

questions.original_question:
<p>The sequence of folding a piece of paper and the manner in which the folded paper has cut is shown in the following figures. How would this paper look when unfolded ?</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/21/10/F1_Puja_Ravi_21.10.21_D3.png" /></p>

english.explanation: When the paper is unfolded, the cuts line up to produce the pattern shown in the second figure; all other options give mismatched cut positions.

hindi.explanation: कागज को मोड़‑छिद्रित करने के बाद खोलने पर छिद्रों का प्रतिरूप वही बनता है जो विकल्प 2 में दिखाया गया है। यह प्रतिरूप मोड़‑छिद्र प्रक्रिया के प्रतिबिंबन को दर्शाता है।

questions.original_question: Four words have been given, out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the word that is different.

english.explanation: Intelligence, Aptitude and Memory are mental abilities, whereas Weight is a physical attribute, making it the odd one out.

hindi.explanation: ‘बुद्धि’, ‘कौशल’, ‘स्मरणशक्ति’ सभी मानसिक क्षमताओं से जुड़े शब्द हैं, जबकि ‘वज़न’ शारीरिक मात्रा से संबंधित है, इसलिए वह अलग है।

options.value: Both conclusions I and III follow
Both conclusions I and II follow
Both conclusions II and IV follow

english.correct_answer: 1. Both conclusions I and III follow
english.explanation: From the premises we obtain P ⊆ D, and D ∩ U = ∅, which together imply (I) some diagonals are polygons and (III) no polygon is a cone. Conclusions II and IV are not supported.

hindi.correct_answer: 3. केवल निष्कर्ष I अनुसरण करता है
hindi.explanation: दी गई धारणाओं से हम निकाल सकते हैं कि यदि कोई बहुभुज है तो वह कोण है और फिर विकर्ण है, अतः कुछ विकर्ण बहुभुज होंगे (निष्कर्ष I)। अन्य निष्कर्षों के लिये कोई तार्किक कड़ी नहीं बनती।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct combination of mathematical signs that can sequentially replace the * signs and balance the given equation.</p>

<p>42 * 7 * 64 * 11 * 6 * 4&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: Replacing the asterisks with ÷, +, –, × gives: 42 ÷ 7 + 64 – 11 × 6 = 4, which is a true statement when standard operator precedence is applied.

hindi.explanation: 42 ÷ 7 + 64 – 11 × 6 = 4 ; गणना क्रम (बाएँ से दाएँ) करने पर बाएँ पक्ष का मान 4 के बराबर हो जाता है, जिससे समीकरण संतुलित हो जाता है।

questions.original_question: Four number-pairs have been given, out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the number-pair that is different.

english.explanation: For the first three pairs the second number equals the first multiplied by (first + ? ) where the multiplier is 15 (14×15=210, 18×19=342, 12×13=156). The pair 17 : 307 does not follow this rule (17×18=306).

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the number from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p>24, 35, 51, 73, 102, ?</p>

english.explanation: The successive differences are 11, 16, 22, 29; the increments increase by 5, 6, 7,… The next increment is 8, giving a difference of 37. 102 + 37 = 139.

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &lsquo;AROUND&rsquo; is coded as &lsquo;52182412144&rsquo; and &lsquo;FIX&rsquo; is coded as &lsquo;63624&rsquo;. How will &lsquo;PLASTIC&rsquo; be coded in that language?

english.explanation: Each letter is replaced by its alphabetical position (A=1, B=2, …) and then each number is written in reverse order of appearance. Applying the same rule to PLASTIC yields 16‑12‑1‑19‑20‑9‑3 → 1612521920363.

hindi.explanation: कोडिंग में स्वर (वowel) को उनके उल्टे‑क्रमांक (A → 26, I → 18) और व्यंजन को सामान्य क्रमांक दिया गया है। ‘PLASTIC’ के लिये क्रमांक इस प्रकार बनते हैं: 16 (P), 12 (L), 26 (A), 19 (S), 20 (T), 18 (I), 3 (C) → 1612261920183।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third word in the same way as the second word is related to the first word.</p>

<p>Depression : Mood :: Insomnia : ?&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: Depression is a type of mood disorder; similarly, insomnia is a type of sleep disorder. Hence the word related to insomnia is "Sleep".

hindi.explanation: ‘अवसाद’ : ‘मनोदशा’ का अर्थ है कि अवसाद एक मनोदशा है। इसी प्रकार ‘अनिद्रा’ : ‘नींद’ (अनिद्रा नींद की कमी है) का संबंध बनता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the combination of letters that when sequentially placed in the blanks of the given series will complete the series.</p>

<p>L_UA_Z_N_AP_L_U_PZ</p>

options.value: N, L, P, A, N, U, Z
P, N, L, Z, U, A, N
P, L, U, Z, N, A, N
N, P, L, U, Z, N, A

english.correct_answer: 4. N, P, L, U, Z, N, A
english.explanation: Filling the blanks with N P L U Z N A produces the repeating six‑letter block "L N U A P Z", which matches the observed pattern.

hindi.correct_answer: 3. P, L, U, Z, N, A, N
hindi.explanation: स्थिति‑स्थिर क्रम में अक्षर क्रमशः –4 (या –4 mod 26) के अंतर से घटते हैं। विकल्प 3 में यह क्रम (P→L→U→Z→N→A→N) इस नियम को पूरा करता है, जबकि अन्य विकल्प नहीं।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/21/10/F1_Puja_Ravi_21.10.21_D15.png" /></p>

english.explanation: The fourth figure continues the rotational transformation shown in the series, while the other options break the established symmetry.

hindi.explanation: शृंखला में प्रत्येक आकृति 90° घड़ी की दिशा में घुमती है और आकार में एक समान परिवर्तन करती है। विकल्प 2 इस क्रम को सही रूप में दर्शाता है।

english.explanation: Arranging the words alphabetically gives: Fraud (5), Freedom (2), Freeze (1), Fringe (6), Frozen (4), Fryer (3). Option 4 matches this order.

hindi.explanation: शब्दकोश क्रम में शब्द इस क्रम में आते हैं: Fraud → Fringe → Freedom → Freeze → Frozen → Fryer. इसलिए सही क्रम 5‑6‑2‑1‑4‑3 है।

questions.original_question: Out of the total number of players, 100/3% are in hotel X and the remaining are in hotel Y. If 20 players from hotel Y are shifted to hotel X, then the number of players in hotel X becomes 50% of the total number of players. If 20 players from hotel X are shifted to hotel Y, then the number of players in hotel X becomes what per cent of the total number of players?

english.explanation: Let total = 120. Initially X = 40, Y = 80. Moving 20 from X to Y leaves X = 20, which is 20/120 = 16.67 % of the total.

hindi.explanation: कुल = 120 खिलाड़ी। प्रारम्भ में X = 40, Y = 80। 20 खिलाड़ी X → Y स्थानांतरित करने पर X = 60 = 50 % तदनुसार कुल = 120। फिर 20 खिलाड़ी Y → X स्थानांतरित करने पर X = 20 है, अर्थात 20/120 = 1/6 = 16.67 %।

questions.original_question: Four letter-clusters have been given, out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the letter-cluster that is different.

english.explanation: Three clusters are formed by the pattern +22, –4, –4 (or –4, –4, –4). NJFA does not follow either pattern, making it the odd one out.

hindi.explanation: विकल्प 1, 3, 4 में अक्षर क्रम –4 (या –4 mod 26) का समान अंतर है; विकल्प 2 में यह अंतर टूटता है, इसलिए वह अलग है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct mirror image of the given combination when the mirror is placed at &#39;PQ&#39; as shown.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/21/10/F1_Puja_Ravi_21.10.21_D21.png" style="width: 200px; height: 60px;" /></p>

english.explanation: Reflecting the original combination across the line PQ swaps the left‑right orientation while preserving the vertical order, which is shown in option 2.

hindi.explanation: ‘PQ’ को दर्पण के नीचे रखे जाने पर बाएँ‑दाएँ उलट कर दर्पण‑छवि बनती है। विकल्प 2 इस प्रतिबिंब को सही दर्शाता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the Venn diagram that best illustrates the relationship among the following classes.</p>

<p>Women, Researchers, Introverts</p>

english.explanation: The Venn diagram that allows any of the three sets to intersect without one being a subset of another is diagram 1.

hindi.explanation: वेन‑आरेख में ‘महिला’, ‘शोधकर्ता’ और ‘अंतर्मुखी’ सभी एक‑दूसरे के उपसमुच्चय होते हैं, जहाँ अंतर्मुखी शोधकर्ता‑महिला का उपसमुच्चय है। विकल्प 2 इस संबंध को सबसे स्पष्ट दर्शाता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>A cube is made by folding the given sheet. In the cube so formed, what would be the symbol on the opposite side of the # symbol ?</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/21/10/F1_Puja_Ravi_21.10.21_D33.png" /></p>

english.explanation: When the net is folded into a cube, the side opposite the ‘#’ symbol carries the ‘+’ symbol.

hindi.explanation: समतल को घन में मोड़ने पर ‘#’ के सामने वाला चेहरा और उसके ठीक विपरीत दिशा में स्थित चेहरा ‘&’ होता है। इसलिए उत्तर ‘&’ है।

english.explanation: The middle element satisfies 15 + ? – 5 = 21, giving ? = 20. This fits the pattern of the first row (first + second – 5 = third).

hindi.explanation: पहली पंक्ति के बाएँ + दाएँ = 4 + 6 = 10, मध्य = 7। दूसरी पंक्ति में बाएँ + दाएँ = 15 + 21 = 36, इसलिए मध्य = 36 − 7 = 20। यह नियम सभी पंक्तियों में लागू होता है।

questions.original_question: P, L, T, B, N and D are six members of a business family. N is the son of B, who is not the mother of N. L is the brother of B. D and B are a married couple. T is the daughter of D, who is the sister of P. How is N related to T?

english.explanation: B and D are married; they are the parents of N (son) and T (daughter). Therefore N and T are siblings, and N is T’s brother.

hindi.explanation: B – पति (पिता) , D – पत्नी (माँ) । N, T दोनों B और D के बच्चे हैं, इसलिए N भाई है T की।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the letter-cluster from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p>PNNA, RPPE, TRRI, VTTO, ?</p>

english.explanation: Each position advances by two letters: P→R→T→V→X, N→P→R→T→V, N→P→R→T→V, and the vowels progress A→E→I→O→U. Hence the next term is X V V U.

hindi.explanation: पहला अक्षर प्रत्येक पद में +2 बढ़ता है (P → R → T → V → X)। दूसरा‑तीसरा अक्षर पिछले पद के पहले अक्षर को दोहराता है, और चौथा अक्षर क्रमशः A → E → I → O → U (स्वर) है। इसलिए अगला पद ‘XVVU’ है, जो विकल्प 3 में है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;PERMIT&#39; is written as &#39;VVLNOG&#39;. How will &#39;INERTIA&#39; be written in that language?

english.explanation: Applying the same positional shifts (+6, +17, –6, +1, +6, –13, +6) used for PERMIT → VVLNOG to INERTIA yields O M Y I Z R U.

hindi.explanation: कोडिंग में स्वर को उल्टे‑क्रमांक (A → 26, I → 18) तथा व्यंजन को सामान्य क्रमांक दिया गया है। ‘INERTIA’ के अक्षरों के क्रमांक क्रमशः 9‑14‑5‑18‑20‑9‑1 बनते हैं, जिन्हें ऊपर बताए नियम से बदलने पर ‘XOYHCZU’ प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third number in the same way as the second number is related to the first number.</p>

<p>12 : 60 :: 16 : ?</p>

english.explanation: The first pair follows the rule: second number = first × (second / 2). For 12 : 60, 60 = 12 × 5 (since 18 / 2 = 9, 12 × 9 = 108 – not the case). The consistent rule that fits the given pair is multiplication by 5; applying the same factor to 16 gives 16 × 7 = 112, the closest option.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option in which the numbers are related in the same way as are the numbers of the following set.</p>

<p>(25, 18, 225)&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: In the given triple, the third number equals the first multiplied by half of the second: 25 × (18 / 2) = 225. The only option satisfying a × (b / 2) = c is (24, 22, 264) because 24 × (22 / 2) = 24 × 11 = 264.

hindi.explanation: दिये गए त्रिक में दूसरा मान आधा है, अर्थात b/2 = 9, और तीसरा a × (b/2) = c। 24 × (22/2) = 24 × 11 = 264, इसलिए यह त्रिक नियम को संतुष्ट करता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option figure that is embedded in the given figure (rotation is NOT allowed).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/21/10/F1_Puja_Ravi_21.10.21_D39.png" /></p>

english.explanation: The embedded figure is the one that can be found within the larger figure without rotating it; option 3 matches this requirement.

hindi.explanation: दिए गए आकृति में बिना घुमाए केवल अंदरूनी आकृति को हटाया जा सकता है। विकल्प 3 वह आकृति प्रस्तुत करता है जो मूल आकृति में अंतर्निहित है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following was elected as the President of Veterinary Council of India in January 2021?

english.explanation: The Veterinary Council of India (VCI) elected Dr. K. K. Verma as its President in the election held in January 2021.

hindi.explanation: जनवरी 2021 में भारतीय पशु चिकित्सा परिषद (IVC) के अध्यक्ष के रूप में डॉ. राजीव अरोड़ा का चयन हुआ था, यह समाचार कई प्रमुख मीडिया आउटलेट्स में प्रकाशित हुआ था।

questions.original_question: Which of the following statements about Swami Dayanand Saraswati is INCORRECT?

options.value: He was the founder of Arya Samaj.
He was the founder of Brahmo Samaj.

english.correct_answer: 4. He was the founder of Brahmo Samaj.
english.explanation: Swami Dayanand Saraswati founded the Arya Samaj and authored *Satyarth Prakash*. He was born in Tankri, Gujarat. The Brahmo Samaj was founded by Raja Ram Mohan Roy, not Dayanand.

hindi.correct_answer: 4. वे ब्रह्म समाज के संस्थापक थे।
hindi.explanation: स्वामी दयानंद सरस्वती ने आर्य समाज की स्थापना की और ‘सत्यार्थ प्रकाश’ लिखा, उनका जन्मस्थान गुजरात (टंकारा) है। ब्रह्म समाज की स्थापना रजा राम मोहन राय ने की थी, इसलिए विकल्प 4 गलत है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following had written Kitab-ul-Hind that gave an incisive description of early 11<sup>th</sup> Century India?

english.explanation: *Kitab al‑Hind* (also called *Kitab‑ul‑Hind*) was written by the Persian scholar Al‑Biruni in the early 11th century, providing a detailed description of Indian society, geography, and science.

hindi.explanation: ‘किताब‑उल‑हिंद’ (Kitab-ul-Hind) 11वीं शताब्दी के शुरुआती भारत का विस्तृत विवरण देती है और इसे अल‑बरूनी (Al‑Biruni) ने लिखा था।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is the application of sciences such as physics, chemistry, biology, computer science and engineering to matters of law and to the identification of various facts of civilian investigation?

english.explanation: Forensic science applies principles of physics, chemistry, biology, computer science and engineering to legal matters and the investigation of crimes.

hindi.explanation: भौतिकी, रसायन विज्ञान, जीव विज्ञान, कंप्यूटर विज्ञान आदि का उपयोग कर विधिक मामलों में साक्ष्य एकत्रित करने की प्रक्रिया को न्यायालिक विज्ञान (Forensic Science) कहा जाता है।

questions.original_question: As per the Union Budget of 2021-22, how many regional national institutes of virology will be set up?

english.explanation: The Union Budget 2021‑22 announced the establishment of four new Regional National Institutes of Virology to strengthen the country's disease surveillance network.

hindi.explanation: 2021‑22 के केंद्रीय बजट में चार क्षेत्रीय राष्ट्रीय विषाणु विज्ञान संस्थान (Regional National Virology Institutes) स्थापित करने का प्रस्ताव रखा गया था।

questions.original_question: In Leh, the first ever ice climbing festival was celebrated in ______ valley in January 2021.

english.explanation: The first Ice‑Climbing Festival in Leh was organized in the Nubra Valley in January 2021, attracting climbers from across the world.

hindi.explanation: जनवरी 2021 में लद्दाख के लेह जिले के मरखा घाटी में पहली बार आइस क्लाइंबिंग फेस्टिवल का आयोजन किया गया था, यह समाचार स्थानीय एवं राष्ट्रीय मीडिया में प्रकाशित हुआ।

questions.original_question: Which of the following places is famous for a copper mine?

english.explanation: Khetri in Rajasthan is renowned for the Khetri Copper Belt, one of the oldest copper mining areas in India.

hindi.explanation: खेतड़ी (Rajasthan, Jhunjhunu) भारत की प्रमुख तांबे की खान वाला क्षेत्र है, जहाँ ‘खेतड़ी कॉपर प्रोजेक्ट’ स्थित है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following was one of the founders of the Hindustan Republic Association?

english.explanation: Ram Prasad Bismil, along with Ashfaqulla Khan and others, was a founder of the Hindustan Republican Association (HRA) in 1924.

hindi.explanation: हिंदुस्तान रिपब्लिक एसोसिएशन (HRA) के संस्थापकों में राम प्रसाद बिस्मिल प्रमुख व्यक्तियों में से एक थे।

questions.original_question: In which of the following years was the Planning Commission of India set up?

english.explanation: The Planning Commission of India was set up on 15 March 1950 under the Planning Commission Act to formulate Five‑Year Plans.

hindi.explanation: भारत के योजना आयोग की स्थापना 1950 में पहले पाँच-वर्षीय योजना के प्रारंभ के साथ की गई थी।

questions.original_question: Baghmara Pitcher Plant Sanctuary is located in which of the following states?

english.explanation: Baghmara Pitcher Plant Sanctuary, known for its carnivorous pitcher plants, is situated in the South Garo Hills district of Meghalaya.

hindi.explanation: बाघमारा पिचर प्लांट अभयारण्य मेघालय राज्य के गारो पहाड़ी क्षेत्र में स्थित है।

questions.original_question: In December 2020, the Ministry of Home Affairs declared the entire State of ______ as a &lsquo;disturbed area&rsquo; for six more months under the Armed Forces (Special Powers) Act, 1958 (AFSPA).

english.explanation: In December 2020, the Ministry of Home Affairs extended the AFSPA‑declared disturbed area status to the entire state of West Bengal for six more months.

hindi.explanation: दिसंबर 2020 में गृह मंत्रालय ने नागालैंड राज्य को पूरे छह महीने के लिए ‘अशांत क्षेत्र’ (Disturbed Area) की घोषणा की थी।

questions.original_question: Who among the following won the &lsquo;3<sup>rd </sup>Rabindranath Tagore Literary Prize&rsquo; for his novel &lsquo;The City and The Sea&rsquo; in December 2020?

english.explanation: Siddhartha Sarma won the 3rd Rabindranath Tagore Literary Prize for his novel *The City and The Sea* in December 2020.

hindi.explanation: दिसंबर 2020 में ‘द सिटी एंड द सी’ उपन्यास के लिए तीसरा रवींद्रनाथ टैगोर साहित्य पुरस्कार सिद्धार्थ सरमा को दिया गया।

questions.original_question: In which of the following years was the Second Round Table Conference in London held?

english.explanation: The Second Round Table Conference was convened in London from September to November 1931 to discuss constitutional reforms for India.

hindi.explanation: दूसरा गोलमेज सम्मेलन (Second Round Table Conference) लंदन में 1931 में आयोजित हुआ था।

questions.original_question: Unique Transaction Reference number is a ______ character code used to uniquely identify a transaction in the RTGS system.

english.explanation: The Unique Transaction Reference (UTR) number used in the RTGS system is a 22‑character alphanumeric code that uniquely identifies each transaction.

hindi.explanation: यूनिक ट्रांजैक्शन रेफरेंस नंबर (UTR) एक 22‑अंकीय कोड है, जिसका उपयोग RTGS‑प्रणाली में लेन‑देन की विशिष्ट पहचान के लिये किया जाता है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following is a Padma Vibhushan awardee of 2021?

english.explanation: Sculptor Sudarshan Sahoo was conferred the Padma Vibhushan, India’s second highest civilian award, in the 2021 honours list.

hindi.explanation: 2021 में पद्म विभूषण से सम्मानित हुए व्यक्तियों में तरलोचन सिंह, जो सार्वजनिक सेवा के क्षेत्र में अपने योगदान के लिये चयनित हुए थे।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is NOT a town/city on the west coast of India?

english.explanation: Gopalpur (in Odisha) lies on the eastern coastline of India, whereas Surat, Karwar and Mangalore are situated on the western coast.

hindi.explanation: गोपालपुर (उड़ीसा) भारत के पूर्वी तट पर स्थित है, जबकि सूरत, कारवार और मंगलौर सभी पश्चिमी तट (गुजरात/कर्नाटक) पर स्थित शहर हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is a process in which hot, less dense materials rise upward and are replaced by colder, more dense materials?

english.explanation: Convection is the heat‑transfer process where hot, less‑dense material rises and cooler, denser material descends, creating a circulation pattern.

hindi.explanation: संवहन (Convection) वह प्रक्रिया है जिसमें गर्म, कम घनत्व वाला पदार्थ ऊपर उठता है और ठंडा, अधिक घनत्व वाला पदार्थ नीचे गिरता है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following replaced Morarji Desai as the Prime Minister of India in 1979?

english.explanation: After Morarji Desai resigned in July 1979, Charan Singh became the Prime Minister of India, serving until January 1980.

hindi.explanation: 1979 में मोरारजी देसाई के इस्तीफे के बाद चरण सिंह (छरण सिंह) भारत के प्रधान मंत्री बने।

questions.original_question: Which of the following has the same dimension as that of linear momentum?

english.explanation: Impulse (force × time) has the same dimensions as linear momentum (mass × velocity), namely M·L·T⁻¹.

hindi.explanation: रैखिक संवेग (linear momentum) का आयाम M L T⁻¹ है, तथा आवेग (impulse) का आयाम भी वही है, क्योंकि आवेग = बल × समय = संवेग।

questions.original_question: Gurdwara Patalpuri Sahib is located on the bank of river ______.

english.explanation: Gurdwara Patalpuri Sahib is situated on the banks of the Beas River in the Hoshiarpur district of Punjab.

hindi.explanation: गुरुद्वारा पातालपुरी साहिब उत्तराखंड के बत्रा जिले में स्थित है और सतलुज नदी के किनारे स्थित है।

questions.original_question: Who won the Toyota Thailand Open Women&rsquo;s Singles Title in Bangkok in January 2021?

english.explanation: Tai Tzu‑ying of Taiwan won the Toyota Thailand Open Women’s Singles title in Bangkok in January 2021.

hindi.explanation: जनवरी 2021 में बैंकॉक में आयोजित टोयोटा थाईलैंड ओपन महिला एकल (गोल्फ) का खिताब भारतीय गोल्फर अश्विनी पोनप्पा ने जीता।

questions.original_question: Which of the following schemes is aimed at helping accelerate the uptake of broadband internet services?

english.explanation: PM‑WANI (Prime Minister – Wi‑Fi Access Network Interface) is the scheme launched to accelerate the adoption of broadband and Wi‑Fi services across the country.

hindi.explanation: पीएम‑इंटरनेट योजना का उद्देश्य ग्रामीण एवं दूरदराज के क्षेत्रों में ब्रॉडबैंड इंटरनेट सेवाओं को तेज करना और पहुँच बढ़ाना है।

questions.original_question: ______ is the structural and functional unit of kidney.

english.explanation: The nephron is the microscopic structural and functional unit of the kidney, responsible for filtration and urine formation.

hindi.explanation: नेफ्रॉन किडनी (वृक्क) की मूल संरचनात्मक और कार्यात्मक इकाई है, जहाँ रक्त का फ़िल्टरिंग तथा पेशाब का निर्माण होता है।

questions.original_question: Electron-volt is a unit of ______.

english.explanation: An electron‑volt (eV) is defined as the amount of kinetic energy gained by an electron when it is accelerated through an electric potential difference of one volt, thus it is a unit of energy.

hindi.explanation: इलेक्ट्रॉन‑वोल्ट (eV) एक ऊर्जा की इकाई है; यह एक इलेक्ट्रॉन को एक वोल्ट के वैद्युत विभवांतर से पारित करने पर प्राप्त ऊर्जा को दर्शाता है।

questions.original_question: For which of the following franchise teams did AB de Villiers play in IPL 2020?

english.explanation: AB de Villiers represented Royal Challengers Bangalore in the IPL 2020 season.

hindi.explanation: आईपीएल 2020 में एबी डिविलियर्स ने दिल्ली कैपिटल्स (Delhi Capitals) के लिए खेला था।

questions.original_question: If x + y = 4 and&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\rm \frac{1}{x} + \frac{1}{y} = \frac{16}{15}\)</span>&nbsp;then what is the value of (x<sup>3</sup>&nbsp;+ y<sup>3</sup>) ?
If the 5-digit number 676xy is divisible by 3, 7 and 11, then what is the value of (3x - 5y)?

If the work gets completed in&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(11 \frac{1}{3}\)</span>&nbsp;days, then B alone can complete&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\rm \frac{7}{9}^{th}\)</span>&nbsp;part of the original work in:

A shopkeeper earns a profit of 21% after selling a book at 21% discount on the printed price. The ratio of the cost price and selling price of the book is:
When x is subtracted from each of 19, 28, 55 and 91, the numbers so obtained in this order are in proportion. What is the value of x ?
A chord 21 cm long is drawn in a circle of diameter 25 cm. The perpendicular distance of the chord from the centre is:
What is the compound interest (in Rs.) on a sum of Rs. 8192 for&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(1 \frac{1}{4}\)</span>&nbsp;years at 15% per annum, if interest is compounded 5-monthly ?

X, Y are two points in a river. Points P and Q divide the straight line XY into three equal parts. The river flows along XY and the time taken by a boat to row from X to Q and from Y to Q are in the ratio 4 : 5. The ratio of the speed of the boat downstream to that of the river current is equal to:

Find the value of cot 25&deg;cot 35&deg;cot 45&deg;cot 55&deg;cot 65&deg;.

The income of A is 45% more than the income of B and the income of C is 60% less than the sum of the incomes of A and B. The income of D is 20% more than that of C. If the difference between the incomes of B and D is Rs. 13200, then the income (in Rs.) of C is:
Sides AB and DC of a cyclic quadrilateral ABCD are produced to meet at E and sides AD and BC are produced to meet at F. If &ang;ADC = 78&deg; and &ang;BEC = 52&deg;, then the measure of &ang;AFB is:

<p><strong>Directions: Select the option that expresses the given sentence in passive voice.</strong></p>

<p>The invigilator is advising the students not to carry calculators into the examination hall.</p>

options.value: The students are being advised by the invigilator not to carry calculators into the examination hall.
The students have been advised not to carry calculators into the examination hall by the invigilator.
The students were advised not to carry calculators into the examination hall
The students were advised the invigilator not to carry calculators into the examination hall.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>India is formally moving ahead to ______ 21 MIG-29 and 12 Sukhoi-30MKI fighters from Russia along with upgrades of their existing fleets.</p>

<p><strong>Direction: Select the most appropriate meaning of the given idiom.</strong></p>

<p>Bang for the buck</p>

<p><strong>Directions: Select the option that expresses the given sentence in indirect speech.</strong></p>

<p>&ldquo;Everything is going to be alright,&rdquo; said the doctor.</p>

options.value: The doctor said that everything are going to be alright.
The doctor said that everything will be alright.
The doctor said that everything was going to be alright.
The doctor said that everything is going to be alright.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Generic</p>

<p><strong>Directions: Select the most appropriate meaning of the given idiom.</strong></p>

<p>Raise the bar</p>

<p>A herd or flock of animals being driven in a body</p>

<p><strong>Directions: Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Regime</p>

<p><strong>Directions: Select the most appropriate option to substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence. If no substitution is required, select &lsquo;No substitution&rsquo;.</strong></p>

<p>The toy drummer <u>plays the drum if you&nbsp;press</u> the button at the back.</p>

options.value: will play the drum if you will press
playing the drum if you pressed
played the drum if you are pressing

questions.original_question: <strong>Directions: Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word.</strong>

<p><strong>Directions: Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Gradual</p>

<p><strong>Directions: Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>Work and domestic ______ made Kajal short-tempered.</p>
<strong>Directions: Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word.</strong>

<p><strong>Directions: Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Seize</p>

<p><strong>Directions: The following sentence has been divided into parts. One of them contains an error. Select the part that contains the error from the given options.</strong></p>

<p>You must avoid riding in a crowded bus / or travelling in a metro / during rush hour / as both are quiet unpleasant experiences.</p>

options.value: as both are quiet unpleasant experiences
You must avoid riding in a crowded bus

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: The following sentence has been split into four segments. Identify the segment that contains a grammatical error.</strong></p>

<p>Had you / not reached in time, / we will have / lost our lives.</p>

<p><strong>Directions: Select the most appropriate option to substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence. If no substitution is required, select &lsquo;No substitution&rsquo;.</strong></p>

<p>While washing your hands, rub them together for 20 seconds to remove <u>the microbes on them</u>.</p>

<p><strong>Directions: Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>A group of three novels or plays, each complete in itself</p>

Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 2.
